snippet.title: Battlezone - Gameplay Part 2/2
snippet.description:
A gameplay video to Battlezone from Activision (1998). I deactivated OpenGL because of graphic problems, and yeah this is the Kraut version. Also, i played on hard settings.

Before Battlefield 1942, before Natural Selection, there was a game, a game where you control entire small armies through the first person, drive vehicles, build bases, control through a satellite, change vehicles at will, and blow shit up. That's Battlezone, and it was one of the worst selling games of the year, eventhough it got some of the highest ratings ever. Seriously, this game fucking kicked ass, still kicks ass, and will kick ass forever.
